word: PRIVATE PRAYER IS NEEDED IN ORDER TO BECOME PERSONALLY ACQUAINTED WITH GOD.—Oh, do we know God as we should? What comfort, what joy, we should have if we were to learn daily the lessons He desires us to learn! We must know Him by an experimental knowledge. It will be profitable for us to spend more time in secret prayer, in becoming personally acquainted with our heavenly Father.—(Medical Ministry, 102.)
